Package console

This package contains implementation for input and output over a console.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Console Implements a console.
ConsoleOutputter Implements the outputter interface that all text is sent to the console (System.out).
 

Package console Description

This package contains implementation for input and output over a console.

It receives input, sends it to the invoker, displays the output and shows the prompt.

Allowed Collaboration for the normal console functionality at run-time:

  • invoker
  • command.framework, for the Outputter interface
  • filesystem, to get the prompt from the drive object
